title: Bank Management System
overview: A comprehensive banking application with customer account management, transaction processing, and administrative controls. Features user authentication, balance inquiries, funds transfer, and transaction history tracking.
documentation: A full-featured desktop banking application built with C# and Windows Forms. Implements secure user authentication, comprehensive account management, and complete transaction processing workflows.

title: Dogs vs Cats Image Classifier
overview: A web-based machine learning application that classifies images as dogs or cats using a fine-tuned MobileNet V2 model. Features real-time predictions with adjustable confidence thresholds and a user-friendly interface.
documentation: A machine learning project demonstrating transfer learning with MobileNet V2 for binary image classification. The Streamlit web app provides an intuitive interface for users to upload images and receive instant predictions.

title: Advanced File Management Utility
overview: A powerful command-line utility for comprehensive file operations including network sharing, encryption, hashing, compression, and organization. Implements security features and efficient file handling algorithms.
documentation: A comprehensive C++ utility demonstrating advanced file system operations, cryptographic algorithms, and network programming. Features modular design with separate components for encryption, compression, and file organization.

title: Portfolio Manager
overview: A system that automatically manages my portfolio projects and redeploys to Vercel. Features a dashboard for CRUD operations with GitHub API integration for automatic commits.
documentation: A full-stack portfolio management system that automates the process of updating portfolio content. Changes made through the dashboard are automatically committed to GitHub, triggering Vercel to redeploy the portfolio.
